name: Roy Tang
text: Response to what? Are you asking for an alternative to killing? How about not killing? If you're asking for an alternative candidate you already know I'm undecided right? If response kay Nick, meron na above, which you appear to have completely missed the point of. I do have biases - I'm biased towards looking for the truth and against killings. What are you biased towards? At least si Nick I *think* he's denying na may killings (not entirely sure, language inconsistent sometimes), but you seem to think they're justified even if illegal, in the name of change.
